text: is a former professional Japanese baseball player. As a boy, Ichiro Suzuki learned to pattern his original swinging pendulum leg kick after Shinozuka's. ==External links== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chōshi Category:Baseball people from Chiba Prefecture Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball infielders Category:Yomiuri Giants players Category:Japanese baseball coaches Category:Nippon Professional Baseball coaches
title: Kazunori Shinozuka
